snippet: John B. Rhea came to the city agency with extensive credentials in banking but no experience in housing, and proceeded to become a provocative figure.
abstract: New York City Housing Authority Chairman John B Rhea has turned into a provocative figure since he was installed in 2009, credited with shaking up the bureaucracy and securing desperately needed federal grants; he has also stirred criticism and touched off an exodus of seasoned senior officials, endangering the future of the agency itself, by far the largest housing agency in the country and responsible for sheltering 600,000 people.
lead_paragraph: John B. Rhea came to the city agency with extensive credentials in banking but no experience in housing, and proceeded to become a provocative figure.

headline.seo: John Rhea on Mission to Shake Up New York Housing Authority
headline.main: Bruised Feelings or No, Chairman Applies Jolt to Housing Authority
headline.print_headline: Bruised Feelings or No, Chairman Applies Jolt To Housing Authority
